section.name: VA Services
section.p: The validation authority (VA) part of EJBCA provides services used to validate a certificate:

subsection.name: CA certificate store
subsection.p: is used to get a certificate chain to the root CA in order to verify that the certificate is signed by a trusted CA.

subsection.name: CRL store
subsection.p: is used to get a signed list of revoked certificates for a CA.

subsection.name: OCSP responder
subsection.p: Is used to ask if a certificate is revoked or not. See OCSP Architecture
